author: EDM115 <dev@edm115.eu.org> (https://edm115.dev)
description: Une webapp en Nuxt pour la gestion des inscriptions de l'association Senescalade
name: senescalade

scripts.dev: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const isWindows = process.platform === 'win32'; const command = isWindows ? 'env-cmd' : 'dotenv'; const args = isWindows ? ['cross-env-shell', 'nuxi dev -p $DEV_PORT'] : ['--', 'npm', 'run', '_dev']; const proc = spawn(command, args, { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true });"
scripts.dev-expose: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const isWindows = process.platform === 'win32'; const command = isWindows ? 'env-cmd' : 'dotenv'; const args = isWindows ? ['cross-env-shell', 'nuxi dev -p $DEV_PORT --host'] : ['--', 'npm', 'run', '_dev-expose']; const proc = spawn(command, args, { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true });"
scripts.docker-start: docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d --remove-orphans --wait
scripts.i-clean: rimraf package-lock.json node_modules && npm run i
scripts.start: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const isWindows = process.platform === 'win32'; const command = 'npm'; const args = isWindows ? ['run', 'build && env-cmd cross-env-shell PORT=$DEV_PORT nuxi start'] : ['run', 'build && dotenv -- npm run _start']; const proc = spawn(command, args, { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true });"
